text: Donald "Dee" Rowe (December 22, 1929 â€“ January 10, 2021) was an American college basketball coach. He coached for the UConn Huskies men's team. He was born in Worcester, Massachusetts. He was the director of athletics and the head coach of both the men's basketball and baseball teams at the University of Connecticut for 13 years, from 1955 to 1969. Rowe died on January 10, 2021 in Storrs, Connecticut at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:College basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts Category:Sportspeople from Connecticut Category:People from Worcester, Massachusetts
title: Dee Rowe
